author: Minyvonne Burke and Associated Press
title: Charlotte Figi, girl with severe seizures that inspired CBD treatments, dies at 13
description: The Colorado teen's use of CBD oil to try and ease her rare form of epilepsy drove other families to try CBD and medical marijuana to treat seizures.
content:
Charlotte Figi, a Colorado teenager with a rare form of epilepsy who inspired the name of a CBD oil used in the hopes that it will treat seizures, died Wednesday afternoon. She was 13.
A Facebook message on behalf of the family read: "Charlotte is no longer … [+2142 chars]
